function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality control leading to pathogen transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of infection indoors, endangering occupant health and safety","Mitigation":"Improvement of ventilation systems, air filtration, and indoor air quality monitoring","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, sensors for indoor air quality monitoring","People":"Building occupants, healthcare personnel, general public","Owner":"Facilities management, building owners, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Lack of proper environmental cleaning leading to Hospital-Acquired Infections (HAI)","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of Hospital-Acquired Infections (HAI)","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust environmental cleaning practices and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Cleaning equipment, disinfectants, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Patients, healthcare personnel, visitors","Owner":"Facilities management, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Occupant behavior impacting pathogen transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen transmission due to occupant behaviors","Mitigation":"Education and promotion of hygienic behaviors, implementation of social distancing measures","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, digital signage for education and reminders","People":"Building occupants, healthcare personnel, general public","Owner":"Facilities management, building management"}]}
